message: Let's start with a fair split. I'm willing to give you a good deal, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!

I'm not sure I'm comfortable with the 60/40 split. Can you meet me at 55/45?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think 55/45 is a fairer split. Don't try to take advantage of me!
